lis=[i for i in range(2,100002,2)]
lis1=[]
for i in xrange(len(lis)):
    lis1.append(lis[i])
s=lis1[0]

for i in range(1,len(lis1)):
    lis1[i]+=s
    s=lis1[i]
#print lis1    
for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    for i in xrange(len(lis1)):
        if n<=lis1[i]:
            val=i
            break
    #print i
    if n<=lis1[i]-(i+1):
        print lis[i]-1
    else:
        print lis[i]
